description:
goprotobuf: Handle XXX_unrecognized correctly.

In particular,
  - add it to marshaled messages
  - examine it in Clone, Equal

messages.text:
Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf

LGTM
although it could stand a more helpful CL description. this is hardly better than 'fixed bug'.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf/source/detail?r=2668bb32ec0e ***

goprotobuf: Handle XXX_unrecognized correctly.

In particular,
  - add it to marshaled messages
  - examine it in Clone, Equal

R=r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6449091

subject: code review 6449091: goprotobuf: Handle XXX_unrecognized correctly.
